scripts.install-taskcall: cd static/taskcall && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-add-note-modal: cd static/add-note-modal && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-add-responders-modal: cd static/add-responders-modal && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-reassign-modal: cd static/reassign-modal && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-run-response-set-modal: cd static/run-response-set-modal && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-status-update-modal: cd static/status-update-modal && npm install && npm run build
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run install-taskcall && npm run install-add-note-modal && npm run install-add-responders-modal && npm run install-reassign-modal && npm run install-run-response-set-modal && npm run install-status-update-modal
